   Does a Photograph Depict a 5-Year-Old Syrian Girl Handcuffed at Dulles

Does a Photograph Depict a 5-Year-Old Syrian Girl Handcuffed at Dulles Airport?

* Kim LaCapria
     * Published 2 February 2017
   Share on Facebook Share on Twitter Share on Pinterest Share on Reddit
   Share via Email

  Claim

   An Image depicts a five-year-old Syrian girl in handcuffs at Dulles
   Airport.

Origin

   On 30 January 2017 the tweet embedded above began circulating across
   social media, purportedly depicting a five-year-old Syrian girl placed “in
   handcuffs” by U.S. authorities at Dulles Airport.
